mapper.select: SELECT c.id,c.`name`,c.tel,c.address,c.edit_time FROM company c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.id=u.company_id WHERE u.username=#{id}
select t.`id`,s.`name` name,t.type,t.reg_time,t.back_time,t.leader_check,t.reason,t.uuid from staff s,takeoff t where s.id=t.id
mapper.update: update takeoff set leader_check=#{check},leader_msg=#{msg} where uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id,s.`name`,d.`name` department,s.salary,s.perks,u.usertype type FROM staff s left JOIN users u ON u.username=s.id left JOIN department d ON s.department=d.no right JOIN company c ON u.company_id=c.id where u.company_id=(select company_id from users where username=#{username})
